title: New Champ Select / Locking In
body:
Anyone else seeing a TON of people failing the AFK check when not locking in bans and picks?  It's starting to get a little ridiculous.  Just now I've been through 5 matches where someone failed - at 20 minutes and counting just trying to play the game.

Can we get something done to either increase the penalties for this or just not force people to lock in?

Edit - up to 30 minutes now: http://i.imgur.com/Dtt5VPH.png
